column5: message
Update README.md
Add Xcode 8.3 support and prevent folding manager related crashes.
Update README.md
Added Xcode 8.1 support.
Remove unnecessary ensyreLayoutForTextContainer calls and prevented calling it while the text storage is modified.
Added Xcode 8.0 support (more info https://github.com/alcatraz/Alcatraz/issues/475)
Added Xcode 7.3 support (fixes #81)
Preventing content offset changes while the textStorage is editing (#76)
Added safety checks when removing editorMode KVO observers (#71)
Added the Xcode 7.2 compatibility uuid.

Merge pull request #75 from ReadmeCritic/master

Update Readme
Readme: Update redirects
Added Xcode 7.1 compatibility UUID, fixed editor offset jumps when the minimap is hidden (#68)

Merge pull request #70 from E-B-Smith/master

Updates for Xcode 7.1.0 beta

Merge pull request #69 from stefanceriu/develop

Autohiding for version and comparison editors. Closes #65
Added the DVTPlugInCompatibilityUUID for Xcode 7.0.

* Added the DVTPlugInCompatibilityUUID for Xcode 7.1.0 beta.
* Added the - (id) foldingTokenTypesForLayoutManager:(DVTLayoutManager*)layoutManager method to prevent crash.
Implemented #65 - autohiding for version and comparison editors
Prevents #67 - out of bounds color crashes.

Merge pull request #66 from E-B-Smith/master

Fixed build settings for differently named Xcode.app set-ups.
Fix for the last commit.  I committed too soon.
Fixed build settings for differently named Xcode.app set-ups.
Fixes #61 and general content offset issues.
Added on load parent application check.
Added Xcode 6.4 compatibility UUID.
Switched back to visible range invalidation.
Xcode 7 beta support.

- added search results highlighting
- added autohiding for small files (#44)
- started invalidating the full text range on changes (prevents artifacts)
Fixed size menu item layout and updated readme.
Considering text container insets in offset calculations, moved size menu item title to its own constant.
Removed unnecessary log.
Merge branch 'fix-warning-under-sidebar' of https://github.com/richardjrossiii/SCXcodeMiniMap into richardjrossiii-fix-warning-under-sidebar
Fixed minimap hiding annotations before toggling visibility.
Fixes #58
Fixes selected symbol highlighting crashes under Xcode 6.2
Added selected symbol instances highlighting (#56), background updates for breakpoints and build issues, plus clean up.
Fixed minimap 'View' submenu item creation on Xcode 6.3+
Fixed crashes on editor theme changes.
Added warnings and errors highlighting (#55)
Added plugin compatibility UUIDs for Xcode 6.3.2 and 6.4.
Fixes #46 (live issues) and improves code folding handling

Attempt at fixing #52
- forcing the layoutManager to layout the whole text container
- reusing the same height in both the minimap and the editor textView
Fixes #47 - hiding the scroll view scollers so they don't affec the content offset.
Fixes #48 - allow scrolling the main editor while on top of the minimap
Added Xcode 6.3 compatibility UUID.
Added compatibility UUID for Xcode 6.2

- disabling animations on the minimap content offset changes while dragging (#42)
- forcing background and non-contiguous layout
Various tweaks for #41
Fixes #41
Fixes #39 - Alcatraz support.

- reduced number of syntax highlighting calls
- fixed show/hide minimap menu item state
- fixed crash when being removed from the superview
Fixes one crash and cleans up notification observers on dealloc.

- added breakpoint disabled state highlighting
- reduced number of times breakpoint ranges are calculated
- added compatibility plugin for Xcode 6.3 (#38)
Added size slider menu item and fixed minimap scrollView magnification.

- cleaned up autoresizing masks and fixed sizing issues + exposed minimap size in the minimap menu
- fixed retain cycles
Various tweaks and fixes.
Removed unused IDEBreakpointManager+SCXcodeMinimap
Fixes breakpoint highlighting - switched from IDEBreakpointManager to DBGBreakpointAnnotationProvider.
Breakpoint KVO fixes.
Renamed user defaults keys and added support for main editor highlighting.
Added breakpoints support.
Added code folding support (#19 #28)

Cleaned up notifications, menu items and user defaults, and exposed more configuration options:
- enable/disable comments highlighting
- enable/disable preprocessor directives highlighting
- enabled/disable main editor vertical scroller (#37)
Improved syntax coloring, fixed theme support.
More performance tweaking.
Proper custom theme support .

- performance tweaking
- fixed crash on theme change
- custom theme support

Trying out new approach
- allow the layout manager to only invalidate the visible editor range
- force an invalidation on the visible minimap range afterwards
Performance improvements + various other tweaks.
Various tweaks and fixes.
Fixes the selection view frame when the document and the scrollView heights are equal.
Moved kDefaultZoomLevel to the SCXcodeMinimap class and added highlighting for comment.doc and comment.doc.keyword.
Re-indented using tabs instead of spaces.

- added comment and preprocessor instructions highlighting
- cleaned up theme related methods and selection view.
Fixed content offset updates.

- added back layout manager delegate methods
- added methods for fetching comment and preprocessor colors
- removed test file

Cleanup for v2.0
- added Xcode headers and frameworks
- switched from modifying attributed strings to scroll view magnfication
- removed unused methods
- renamed classes, methods and notifications
- rewrote navigation methods

Add support for Xcode 6.2

Merge pull request #25 from stephencelis/master

Remove NSLog when missing View menu item

Remove NSLog when missing View menu item

I like to run specs (`$ xcodebuild $ARGS test`) on the command line,
and this little log statement chimes in every time. Can we remove it?

Signed-off-by: Stephen Celis <stephen@stephencelis.com>

Merge pull request #10 from djromero/master

Handle mouse events on mouse up.

Handle mouse events on mouse up.

For some reason the view didn't get mouse-down events (it maybe due to
another Xcode plugin or system wide component).
The mouse-up works fine.

Merge pull request #3 from JegnuX/master

Navigation Support
Clean some logs

Click or Drag Support

Add support to go directly at a portion of code using the mini map.
Simple click or dragging are working.
Removed minimap scrollView elasticity

Added a SCInvertedSelectionView

The idea was to get better visibility with a theme like sunset, but this is mostly useless until I also invert the rest of the minimap colors.
Changed SCSelectionView so that the fill color is now the inverse of the brightnessComponent of selected theme's backgroundColor
